**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10 [Bloody Blade Mercenary](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1535) **Source** [Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill](/Sources.aspx?ID=4) pg. 50 **Perception** +6 **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Orcish](/Languages.aspx?ID=9) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +6, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +2, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +6, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +4, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +6 **Str** +4 **Dex** +3 **Con** +1 **Int** +0 **Wis** +1 **Cha** -1 **Items** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31), [Shortbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=77) (20 arrows), [Studded Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5), 15 sp --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +6 **Ref** +9 **Will** +4 **HP** 19 --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** longsword +9 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)), **Damage** 1d8+4 slashing **Ranged** shortbow +8 ([deadly 1d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)), **Damage** 1d6 piercing **[Hunt Prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=10)** You designate a single creature as your prey and focus your attacks against that creature. You must be able to see or hear the prey, or you must be tracking the prey during exploration.
You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks when you [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) your prey and a +2 circumstance bonus to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks when you [Track](/Actions.aspx?ID=66) your prey. You also ignore the penalty for making ranged attacks within your second range increment against the prey you're hunting.
You can have only one creature designated as your prey at a time. If you use Hunt Prey against a creature when you already have a creature designated, the prior creature loses the designation and the new prey gains the designation. Your designation lasts until your next daily preparations. **[Hunted Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=492)** **Requirements** You are wielding a ranged weapon with [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254); **Effect** You take two quick shots against the one you hunt. Make two Strikes against your prey with the required weapon. If both hit the same creature, combine their damage for the purpose of resistances and weaknesses. Apply your multiple attack penalty to each Strike normally. **Precision** The first time the mercenary hits their hunted prey in a round, they deal 1d8 additional precision damage.
name: Bloody Blade Mercenary
